vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Gad living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, only mentioned at Gen.46.16;
son of: Gad (H1410);
brother of: Ziphion (H6837), Haggi (H2291), Shuni (H7764), Eri (H6179), Arod (H0720) and Areli (H0692); also called Ozni at Num.26.16;
Another name of ets.bon (אֶצְבּוֹן "Ezbon" H0675)
§ Ozni = "my ear (hearing)"
n pr m
son of Gad
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
阿斯尼 这个陽性專有名詞在原文的意思是 "我的耳(聽)"
迦得的兒子及其後裔
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
阿斯尼 这个阳性专有名词在原文的意思是 "我的耳(听)"
迦得的儿子及其后裔

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Gad living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, only mentioned at Gen.46.16;
son of: Gad (H1410);
brother of: Ziphion (H6837), Haggi (H2291), Shuni (H7764), Eri (H6179), Arod (H0720) and Areli (H0692); also called Ozni at Num.26.16;
